text: <@U0261PCRQ> <@U02AVFQRJ> <@U0289USNA> (and anyone else who might care about android networking and have an opinion on retrofit)

text: Retrofit sits on top of okhttp
retrofit is just some convenience REST scaffolding extending okhttp
and maybe I'm talking out my ass
I swore I read that in their docs, but it does not look like it.
I thought it was at the time too, but it looks like you just have the choice of using it
right - you CAN use okhttp with retrofit - but it's not out of the box using it.
